sCMOS: file as produced by sCMOS camera with checked fliplr transform. CCD parameters read from tif header by fabio
cor: file as produced by sCMOS camera with checked fliplr transform. CCD parameters read from tif header by fabio
cor_16M: binned 1x1, CCD parameters binned 1x1 read from tif header by fabio
sCMOS_fliplr: binned 2x2, CCD parameters read from tif header by fabio
sCMOS_fliplr_16M: binned 1x1, CCD parameters binned 1x1 read from tif header by fabio
sCMOS_16M: binned 1x1, CCD parameters binned 1x1 read from tif header by fabio
VHR_full: NOT USED: very basic vhr settings, the largest frame available without grid correction
VHR_diamond: first vhr settings of Jun 12 close to diamond 2theta axis displayed is vertical, still problem with fit from PeakSearchGUI
VHR_small: vhr close to diamond Nov12 frame size is lower than VHR_diamond
ImageStar: Imagestar photonics Science close to diamond March13  extension is mar.tiff
ImageStar_raw_3056x3056: raw image Apr 2018 imagestar for diamond binning 1x1  .tif (could be read by VHR_DLS?)
ImageStar_1528x1528: Imagestar photonics Science close to diamond May 2018  extension is mar.tiff  non remapping 1528x1528
ImageDeathStar: Imagestar photonics Science close to sample, mounting similar to MARCCD, Sep14
ImageStar_dia_2021: Imagestar photonics Science close to diamond March13  extension is mar.tiff
VHR_diamond_Mar13: vhr close to diamond Mar13 frame size is lower than VHR_diamond
VHR: vhr settings of Jun 12 2theta axis displayed is horizontal, no problem with fit from PeakSearchGUI
VHR_Feb13: vhr settings of Feb13 close to sample 2theta axis displayed is vertical, no problem with fit from PeakSearchGUI
VHR_PSI: vhr at psi actually read by libtiff (variable header size and compressed data)
VHR_DLS: vhr at dls actually read by libtiff (variable header size and compressed data)
PRINCETON: ROPER Princeton Quadro 2048x2048 pixels converted from .spe to .mccd
FRELON: FRELON camera 2048x2048 pixels, 2theta axis is horizontal (edf format)
TIFF Format: CCD parameters read from tiff header
EDF: CCD parameters read from edf header EIGER
pnCCD: pnCCD from SIEGEN only: pixel size and frame dimensions OK
pnCCD_Tuba: pnCCD from Tuba only: pixel size and frame dimensions OK
EIGER_4M: CCD parameters read from tif header EIGER4M used at ALS
EIGER_4Mstack: detector parameters read hdf5 EIGER4M stack used at SLS
EIGER_4Munstacked: unstacked hdf5 EIGER4M  used at SLS
EIGER_1M: CCD parameters read from edf header EIGER1M at BM32 ESRF
